sections.heading: Funds; appropriation not required
sections.text: No previous annual appropriation of funds shall be required as a condition precedent to disbursement of any funds for the purpose of carrying out the objects of section 18-601.SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 34, ยง 15, p. 200;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 18-1915;R.S.1943, ยง 18
